definition: an iron bucket used for hoisting in wells or mining, to grind coarsely
details:
noun
- an iron bucket used for hoisting in wells or mining
= example: an iron bucket used for hoisting in wells or mining
- coarsely ground grain or meal, often pelletized, as for animal food
= example: coarsely ground grain or meal, often pelletized, as for animal food
verb
- to grind coarsely
= example: to grind coarsely
